content:
That's funny, at the bottom of https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/releases/tag/v5.13 there's a contributor called "type". I didn't know releases could have contributors.

Screenshot-2023-05-20-at-2.48.19-PM.png

"In the "Describe this release" field, type a description for your release. If you @mention anyone in the description, the published release will include a Contributors section with an avatar list of all the mentioned users. Alternatively, you can automatically generate your release notes by clicking Generate release notes." https://docs.github.com/en/repositories/releasing-projects-on-github/managing-releases-in-a-repository
Ah it must be because we have "Author/creators now have an @type of Person or Organization" in there.
Philip Durbin has marked this topic as resolved.
